name: Nexum
description: Nexum has created a multi-chain “Layer 3” ecosystem that seamlessly connects blockchain with traditional finance. At its center is Nexum Hub, a platform enabling the development of cutting-edge blockchain-powered financial services. The current product suite includes decentralized IDs, stablecoin yield solutions, and the first on-chain loan origination platform for financing bunker invoices. Nexum simplifies financial transactions with intuitive, regulatory-compliant blockchain solutions. In Nexum, we believe in empowering the individual, in removing barriers and facilitating financial inclusion. We develop the tools that put the individual back in control.
